entry.title: Eyelash Booster Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Medical Beauty Research
Type: Eyelash Booster
Price: 150.00

A strengthening and nourishing lash serum for long, dense and voluminous lashes and bold eyebrows. By extending the growth cycle of the hair, it allows the eyelashes and eyebrows to grow longer and stronger. Eyelash Booster increases the hair density dramatically and improves the hair anchoring, while providing optimal moisture and a healthy sheen to eyelashes and eyebrows.

• Thickens and lengthens the lashes

• Increases density of lashes and eyebrows

• Strengthens hair roots

• Promotes natural hair growth

• Provides maximum moisture

• Extends the growth cycle while decreasing loss of hair

- 3 ml | .1 oz

- *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

Medical Prostaglandin Derivate, Biotin, Hyaluronic Acid.

Directions

Use Eyelash Booster every evening after cleansing your face. Carefully apply the product to your upper and lower lash line with the applicator brush, like an eyeliner and allow it to be absorbed. It can also be used on eyebrows. Once the desired lash length has been reached, application 3 times per week is sufficient. First visible results after 2-3 weeks. Note: Do not use serum on injured skin areas or before and after sunbathing. Do not allow to enter eyes. Not suitable for children and teenagers under the age of 18, pregnant and breastfeeding women.

entry.title: Mascara - Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: NU Evolution
Type: Mascara
Price: 28.00

A luxurious mascara in deep rich black made with hydrating oils that nourish + condition lashes, while waxes, rice powder, and other dynamic ingredients add thickness, definition, and a volumizing effect.

NU Evolution's perfectly shaped brush allows the formula to glide on smoothly and accentuate each lash.

• Made WITHOUT: Formaldehyde, Parabens, Artificial Dyes, Synthetic Fragrances, Phenoxyethanol, BHT, Dimethicone, Propylene/Butylene Glycol, Phthalates.

• Cruelty free, Vegan, Gluten free

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Chamomile Hydrosol (Matricaria Recutita)*, Cera Alba (Beeswax)*, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax*, Shellac, Stearic Acid, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Powder, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Sodium Hydroxide, Glycerin (Vegetable)*, Lecithin*, Tocopherol Acetate (Vitamin E), Origanum Vulgare (Oregano) Leaf Extract*, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract*, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum (Cinnamon) Bark Extract*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Lavendula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract*, Hydrastis Canadensis (Goldenseal) Root Extract*, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Extract*, Caprylyl Glycol. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI-77891), Iron Oxides (Cl-77499), (CI-77491), (CI-77492), Ultramarines (CI-77007). *Certified Organic

Directions

entry.title: Almond Mascara (Dark Brown)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ere Perez
Type: Mascara
Price: 24.00

The ultimate brown natural mascara with conditioning almond & sunflower oils considered to lengthen + strengthen lashes. Smudge-proof and water-resistant, its rich brown color compliments fair skins and hair.

Designed as a nourishing formula that is especially kind to sensitive eyes, it is the perfect mascara for day wear, all seasons and occasions. Made with the highest quality ingredients it’s everything you’d want in a mascara (and then some).

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Cruelty free

Ingredients

beeswax (cera alba), carnauba (copernicia cerifera) wax, soybean (gyicine soja) seed oil, palm kernel (elaeis guineensis) wax, isoamyl laurate, calcium stearate, sun flower (helianthus annuus) oil, isopropyl palmitate, mamey (pouteria sapota) oil, avocado (persea gratissima) oil, sweet almond (prunus amygdalus dulcis) oil, palmitic acid, tocopheryl acetate (vitamin E), orange (citrus aurantium dulcis) oil, lemon (citrus medica limonum) oil, bergamot (citrus bergamia) oil, iron oxides.

Directions

Apply mascara as the last step in your makeup routine. Dip wand into container, wipe excess mascara on the rim and apply in upward strokes to the underside of your lashes. Apply several layers on top lashes to build color, and a single layer to bottom lashes.

entry.title: Coffee Mascara
entry.summary:
Vendor: Evelyn Iona
Type: Mascara
Price: 22.00

Evelyn Iona's Natural & Organic smudge-resistant mascara enhances the eyes by thickening, lengthening, and defining eyelashes, without harming them. This gluten, fragrance and cruelty free mascara is made primarily of ingredients you could eat or drink (like coffee!) - making it safe for even the most sensitive eyes.

• 98% Natural, 85% Organic

• Vegan, Cruelty free, Gluten free

• Paraben free, Sulfate free

• Made in the USA

• .11 oz / 3 g

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Chamomile Hydrosol (Matricaria Recutita)*, Cera Alba (Beeswax)*, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Mica (CI 77019), Coffea Arabica (Coffee Powder)*, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Powder*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Lecithin, Tocopherol Acetate (Vitamin E), Origanum Vulgare Leaf Extract, Thymus Vulgaris Extract, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Bark Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis Flower Extract, Hydrastis Canadensis Root Extract, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Extract*, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Seed Extract*. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), (CI 77491), (CI 77492). *Certified Organic

Directions

entry.title: Avocado Waterproof Mascara
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ere Perez
Type: Mascara
Price: 24.00

Volumizing mascara made with mamey and avocado oils, designed to stimulate growth, regenerate + strengthen lashes. Waterproof, smudge-proof, full black coverage and amazing 24-hour wear. Perfect for day or night to suit your busy lifestyle.

Made with the highest quality natural ingredients and friendly to sensitive eyes. For a natural look or high glamor. A unique waterproof mascara to rely on.

• Free of harsh chemicals such as parabens, phthalates, propylene glycol, paraffin, lead, nanoparticles and more.

• Compatible with even the most sensitive skin types

• Never tested on animals

Ingredients

carnauba (copernicia cerifera) wax, palm kernel (elaeis guineensis) wax, soybean (gyicine soja) seed oil, licania arborea seem, dimethicone, calcium stearate, mamey (pouteria sapota) oil, sweet almond prunus amygdalus dulcis) oil, isopropyl palmitate, avocado (persea gratissima) oil, palmitic acid, tocopheryl acetate (vitamin E), orange (citrus aurantium dulcis) oil, lemon (citrus medica limonum) oil, bergamot (citrus bergamia) oil, iron oxides.

Directions

Always apply as the last step in your makeup routine. Simply dip wand into container, wipe excess mascara on the rim and apply in upward strokes to the underside of your lashes. Apply several layers to build color on top lashes, and a single layer to bottom. Apply to eyebrows to shape them in upwards motions, then straighten out the top line. Remove mascara with sweet almond oil.

entry.title: Almond Oil Mascara - Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ere Perez
Type: Mascara
Price: 24.00

This best-seller is the original natural mascara that launched the Ere Perez range. Smudge-proof, water-resistant and made with the highest quality ingredients, the use of organic almond oil strengthens and lengthens lashes, prevents lashes from falling out and stimulates growth with conditioning Vitamin E. Perfect for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.

• Free of harsh chemicals such as parabens, phthalates, propylene glycol, paraffin, lead, nanoparticles and more.

• Compatible with even the most sensitive skin types

• Never tested on animals

Ingredients

beeswax (cera alba), carnauba (copernicia cerifera) wax, palm kernel (elaeis guineensis) wax, soybean (gyicine soja) seed oil, isopropyl laurate, calcium stearate, isopropyl palmitate, sweet almond, palmitic acid, mamey (pouteria sapota) oil, avocado (persea gratissima) oil, tocopheryl acetate (vitamin E), orange (citrus aurantium dulcis) oil, lemon (citrus medica limonum) oil, bergamot, iron oxides

Directions

Always apply as the last step in your makeup routine. Simply dip wand into container, wipe excess mascara on the rim and apply in upward strokes to the underside of your lashes. Apply several layers to build color on top lashes, and a single layer to bottom. Apply to eyebrows to shape them in upwards motions, then straighten out the top line. Remove mascara with sweet almond oil.

entry.title: Expressionist Mascara PRO
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Makeup
Price: 22.00

This boundary-breaking formula creates big and bold lashes instantly. With a synergistic botanical blend, it nourishes eyelashes while its hyper-pure mineral pigments create the blackest of black for highly defined luxurious lashes. The high-tech brush design precisely separates the thinnest, shortest, hard-to-reach lashes by expertly raising and lengthening each lash, applying a precise amount of product with every application.

• Free of asbestos, fiberglass, talc, aluminum, coal-tar, and fiber

• Nourishes and conditions with sunflower oil

• No clump, no flake, no smear formula

• Water-resistant

• Natural Ingredients

• Made in the USA with love

• Not tested on animals OR robots

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles and bad mojo

Ingredients

Aqua (water), Cera Alba (beeswax), Stearic Acid, Copernica Cerifera, Cera/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba Wax), Castor Isostearate Beeswax Succinate, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Xanthan Gum, Cellulose, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Tocopherol, Helanthius Annuus Seed Oil/ Helanthius Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Geraniol, Liminene, Parfum. May contain (+/-): CI 77499 (Iron Oxide).T

Directions

Using brush applicator, apply to eyelashes.
